home-features.title: Deploy your GitHub repository to performant infrastucture in a few clicks
home-features.text: Connect your GitHub account and select your project in a few simple steps. Git push new code and we instantly update by connecting to the GitHub Actions pipeline.

home-hero.description: Connect your GitHub account and instantly deploy your static web projects on IONOS own DDoS-protected georedundant and green infrastructure.

getting-started.title: Getting started
getting-started.text: How to connect a repository and setup a deployment.

deploy-sample.title: Deploy a sample
deploy-sample.text: Setup a deployment with one of our framework samples.

home-samples.title: The home for your Jamstack project or Single Page Application

home-team.overline: We are the team - We are deploy now
home-team.title:
Developed just for devs:
Meet the IONOS Experts behind Deploy Now

home-workflow.title: The ideal workflow for you, your team and your clients
home-workflow.text: You want to preview changes before they go live? Simply setup multiple feature branches as staging deployments. View changes live ander a preview link before merging them back.

about-us.title:
Hi, nice to meet you!
We are Deploy Now.
about-us.text: Our company asked us to build a product that we would use by ourselves, so we did. Our mission is to connect the GitHub community to our performant inhouse engineered hosting platform.
about-us.ionos-text: Headquartered in Germany, IONOS offers various webhosting, domain and cloud products in Europe and North America. IONOS manages more than 8 million customer contracts and hosts over 12 million domains in own regional data centers. Customers in all markets canbenefit from a free, personal 24/7 support in their language.
about-us.feedback-text: We are not done yet! Do you have ideas for Deploy Now or are you missing a feature? We would love to hear your feedback. You can use the feedback button in the product or send a mail to our Product Owner Robert.

404.title: Oh no! There is nothing here.
